action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid. The first and last columns are all X's. The middle (third) column has X's only in row 3. The second and fourth columns have X's only in row 2. The grid looks symmetrical horizontally.

The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form the left and right columns. Row 4 has X's everywhere except position 3. The remaining inner positions are empty boxes (▢) except for position 3,3 which has an X.

This is my DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid. The first and last columns are all X's. The middle (third) column has X's only in row 3. The second and fourth columns have X's only in row 2. The grid looks symmetrical horizontally.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In your grid, what symbols appear in row 4 (the second-to-last row)?
